name: Clean Up Fiasco
description:
Made together with Roberto and Dilara for the Tri Campus Game Jam 2022

Your house has been overrun by critters spreading dirt everywhere! Quick! Clean up the mess before it gets any worse!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Use Item

Right Click: Swap Items

Space bar: Enter door / Grab Furniture / Release Furniture

Use your vacuum cleaner to clean up dirt and get rid of dust bunnies, and use your broom to whack those pesky rats.
